A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Everyone is so whiny because the movie was not a predictable \"lets blow up the superweapon again\" and \"my Snoke theory was wrong/not answered\" movie... The movie had flaws but in a very long time I was actually gripped by a star wars move! I loved among other things how Snoke was killed off with no backstory... as was Palpatine in the Return of the Jedi...
